parameterdescription.para: Weight matrix in Q4_0 format [M x K]

memberdef.argsstring: (float *y, const void *W, const float *x, int M, int K)
memberdef.name: gemv_q4_0_ref

briefdescription.para: Matrix-vector multiply with Q4_0 weights (scalar reference)

parameterdescription.para: Weight matrix in Q4_0 format [M x K]
Number of columns (must be multiple of 32)

briefdescription.para: GEMM/GEMV kernels with Q4_0 quantized weights.

detaileddescription.para:
Q4_0 Format:
32 weights per block
1 FP16 scale per block
18 bytes per 32 weights = 4.5 bits/weight
Operations: Forward: Y = W @ X (W is Q4_0, X and Y are FP32) Backward: dX = W^T @ dY (gradient w.r.t. input)
Note: Weight gradients are not computed for quantized weights. For fine-tuning, use LoRA adapters which maintain FP32 gradients separately.
